tweet: It was great to take a few minutes today to chat with @RepBrianFitz, my partner on introducing the SAVE Act, which will expand access and lower health care costs. Look forward to getting this done together! pic.twitter.com/lp7vnOoFw9

Delivering a speech on the floor of the House is a great honor. Doing it to deliver a message from the people of my district that we need to take bipartisan steps to lower health care costs makes it even greater. Proud to officially introduce the #SAVEAct. pic.twitter.com/mmVHFcv9bk
First bill. First floor speech. Big day today introducing the SAVE Act, which brings a bipartisan approach to increase access and lower health care costs. pic.twitter.com/uxOVzXbmp9

Later today, I’ll vote to pass two bipartisan bills that will close loopholes and make our communities safer. Last week I met with @MomsDemand in our district to hear why this is so important. Proud to vote yes on these bills today. pic.twitter.com/eg1P7jRngV

From our Joint Base to prescription drug prices, I heard from so many of you this past weekend about the priorities of our district. I'm proud to bring those back to Congress to fight for you.  https://thesandpaper.villagesoup.com/p/kim-applauded-at-first-ocean-county-town-hall/1802198 …

One of the most important things that any member of Congress does is help navigate red tape and other issues with federal agencies. If you have any issues with your Social Security, Medicare or VA benefits. Check out how we can help: https://kim.house.gov/services/help-federal-agency …

The concerns and ideas I heard this weekend at my town hall weren't partisan-driven, they were from people in our communities who want to get things done. Providing quality care for our veterans should be a top priority for our Congress and country. Today is #PresidentsDay and an opportunity to reflect on the things that make our democracy so special. It's up to us to fight for it, and that's why I'm a proud co-sponsor of #HR1. It's time to make our government work #ForThePeople. pic.twitter.com/6FfQ0iuoQk

From lowering prescription drug costs to expanding access to VA care, I heard a lot from you at our town hall on Saturday. Yesterday I heard the concerns of so many of you about making Congress work. The only way we can do that is by making it work for us. That's why I co-sponsored #HR1. Because it's time to make the government work #ForThePeople. pic.twitter.com/GPIGGSyW2y

Town halls are an opportunity for me to hear from you. To bring your priorities back to Congress and fight for our district. Just finished my second town hall and wanted to thank everyone who came out and shared their ideas on how to make our district even better. Look forward to bringing them back to Congress and working for you. pic.twitter.com/05zi4VGhZB

Took a few mins to take my staff on a tour of the Capitol. If you’re coming to DC and want a Capitol tour, visit my website and we’ll help make your trip to Washington a special one.  http://kim.house.gov/services/tours-and-tickets … pic.twitter.com/lHR3dGmeoc

Looking forward to hearing from people across our district at tomorrow's town hall. There's a lot of work to do, and it starts by listening. Hope to see you there. https://twitter.com/AsburyParkPress/status/1096393692900978688 …
This is what I came to Congress to do, and I will work hard to deliver on that promise.

I hope this is a new day for our Congress. From here, we must move forward and work together to lower prescription drug costs, clean up corporate influence in our government, support our military and empower our small businesses.

I just voted on a bill that would avoid a #GovernmentShutdown and keep the government open. This should be the last time we vote to avoid a shutdown at the 11th hour. We should always be able to come together to find common ground and get the job done.

Later tonight I’m going to vote to keep our government open and avoid another #GovernmentShutdown. I’m looking forward to getting back to work and delivering for our district. pic.twitter.com/xlY3B3cLPX

Getting big money out of our politics isn't a Democratic or Republican issue, it's an American issue. I'm proud to be a co-sponsor of #HR1 and look forward to voting to pass it through the House. pic.twitter.com/MNbPtRkZQo

One year ago today, 17 lives were lost at MSD. It's important that we listen to the survivors and help them carry forward their efforts to make sure this doesn't happen again. Great job by @mikiebarb in bringing that conversation forward. https://nyti.ms/2E8ZsmG

Our Congress can't work unless it works #ForThePeople. That's why I'm proud to co-sponsor #HR1 and am thrilled to see it discussed in @HouseAdm_Dems today. I look forward to voting for it once it reaches the House Floor.  https://cha.house.gov/hr1
Thanks to @Mulshine for sitting down with me to hear about my priorities and plans for delivering for our district. https://twitter.com/Mulshine/status/1096020457671847943 …

Yesterday on the House Floor, we observed a moment of silence for the 17 lives lost a year ago today at MSD. My thoughts are with them today, and those carry on the fight for common-sense measures to make sure this never happens again. #MSDstrong pic.twitter.com/tl4GPmsvVg

The American people don't want another #GovernmentShutdown. It's why I co-sponsored the #SEASAct, to make sure we talk through our differences instead of having them put working people's paychecks at risk. pic.twitter.com/eDHbB0bE5t

I had a chance today to listen to J. Kelly Conklin, a small biz owner from NJ, on what the @HouseSmallBiz can do to empower and better serve New Jersey small business owners. pic.twitter.com/uZhNLWH8oM

Working families in New Jersey already pay their fair share. Why would we make it harder for them to make ends meet? It's time to restore the #SALT deduction and help families in our district. pic.twitter.com/NGltAprri3

Have you filed your taxes yet? The IRS is reporting that refunds are down 8.4%. That’s money out of your pocket. It’s why I’m proud to stand with a bipartisan group to restore our #SALT deductions and help New Jersey families. pic.twitter.com/oiSw4UOCWN

I couldn’t do this job without listening to the people of our district. That’s why I’m proud to announce my second town hall, this Saturday at 1pm. Visit my website at  https://kim.house.gov  for details. pic.twitter.com/6ZlcH79SZU

Thanks for stopping by and sharing your insights on how we can help support small businesses. Excited to bring that to my colleagues on @HouseSmallBiz. https://twitter.com/NJSBDC/status/1095413413709266944 …

As the father of two young kids, I know the importance of #paidleave for New Jersey families. It's why I'm proud to support the #FAMILYAct to make critical support more accessible to working Americans. pic.twitter.com/81FvUqGltf

We have to do everything we can in Washington to make sure we’re delivering to the people of New Jersey. Check out my call for Congress to pass the #SALT Act in the @BurlcoTimes: https://www.burlingtoncountytimes.com/news/20190211/nj-delegation-fighting-to-restore-state-and-local-taxes-deduction …
I came to Congress to get things done for my district. It's why I'm proud to join Democrats and Republicans in supporting the #SALT Act. We need #TaxFairness now. pic.twitter.com/tmDzKdBaBs

I was proud to stand with my colleagues from both sides of the aisle yesterday to promote true #TaxFairness for New Jersey families. The time is now to pass the #SALT Act. https://twitter.com/JDSalant/status/1095046869863022597 …
learn more about this week and how you can help honor our veterans by visiting: https://www.volunteer.va.gov/NationalSaluteVeteranPatients.asp …

Today is the start of National Salute to Veteran Patients Week, which gives us a chance to say thank you to the millions of veterans who have served, and rededicate ourselves to making sure they have the best medical care possible at our VA facilities.

We're a little more than four days away from another #GovernmentShutdown, but it doesn't have to be this way. It's why I proudly co-sponsored the #SEASAct to force both sides to find solutions instead putting thousands of families at risk. pic.twitter.com/ECMWXzm1hp

I'm proud to have joined @BillPascrell @FrankPallone and @SenatorMenendez today to address this issue and bring #TaxFairness to New Jersey families. https://twitter.com/BillPascrell/status/1095002866648051718 …

I'm proud to have just voted to pass HR840, which expands child care services for our veterans. This is a proven approach that helps those who have severed our nation, and we must continue to find ways to improve services for our vets.  #ChildCare4Vets pic.twitter.com/Xp92VLS6hI

I want to thank Petty Officer Thornton and the @USCG again for being my guest at the #SOTU. His service, and the service of all our men and women in uniform, is an important part of what keeps our country great. pic.twitter.com/CzR4NDjg3I

We can tackle these challenges together with both civility and strength. I will continue to lead on these important issues and hope to see action from leaders of both parties that will make a positive impact in the lives of people in our district.

We can work in a bipartisan way to lower prescription drug prices, take dirty money out of our political system and give power back to the people, address an opioid crisis that is crippling our communities and deliver for our men and women in uniform.

Some thoughts post #SOTU:  I came to Congress to deliver for the people of New Jersey’s Third Congressional District. If the President is serious in his calls for more bipartisan action, the time is now to show those calls are more than just empty talk.
Heading over to the Capitol with our guest, Petty Officer Thornton, after a great conversation about the importance of service for the people of New Jersey. #SOTU pic.twitter.com/VJzmY3LFQz

Proud to have USCG Petty Officer Eric Thornton from Manahawkin as my guest at the #SOTU tonight. His story is an example of what happens when we put service first. https://kim.house.gov/media/press-releases/new-jersey-coast-guardsman-attend-state-union-guest-congressman-kim …
